document.full_text: told that president barack obama is to attend the launch of the space shuttle skippered by her husband, wounded arizona democratic representative gabrielle giffords had just one word: "awesome."
document.title: obama attendance at shuttle launch "awesome": giffords
lines_and_colors: told that president barack obama is to attend the launch of the space shuttle skippered by her husband, wounded arizona democratic representative gabrielle giffords had just one word: "awesome."
